content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseDelimitedTextFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT ,
	       FORMAT_OPTIONS (
			 FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
			 FIRST_ROW = 2,
			 USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE
			))
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'csv_datalakedemodp203_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [csv_datalakedemodp203_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://csv@datalakedemodp203.dfs.core.windows.net', 
		TYPE = HADOOP 
	)
GO

drop external table [dbo].[csvpool]
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.[csvpool] (
	[Correlation id] nvarchar(4000),
	[Operation name] nvarchar(4000),
	[Status] nvarchar(4000),
	[Event category] nvarchar(4000),
	[Level] nvarchar(4000),
	[Time] nvarchar(4000),
	[Subscription] nvarchar(4000),
	[Event initiated by] nvarchar(4000),
	[Resource type] nvarchar(4000),
	[Resource group] nvarchar(4000),
	[Resource] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Log.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = [csv_datalakedemodp203_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.[csvpool]
GO
